Election officials confirmed that the 37: vote difference between the initial count and a hand recount was due to human error and not a flaw in Dominion software.
A forensic audit conducted by the Georgi: s office on a random sampling of Dominion Voting Machines found no evidence of tampering.
Dominion Voting Systems: the company responsible for election software and hardware, has been falsely accused of voter fraud in the aftermath of the 2020 election.
U: S. Rep. Jody Hice, R-Ga., spread misleading information by claiming that a forensics examination of a Dominion Voting Systems machine in Ware County, GA, found votes were switched from Donald Trump to Joe Biden. State election officials clarified that the error was a result of human error and was promptly corrected.
